ayas.translation: WHEN THE WORLD is shaken up by its cataclysm,

bismillah.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.

ayas.translation: And the earth throws out its burdens,
And man enquires: "What has come over it?"
That day it will narrate its annals,
For your Lord will have commanded it.

ayas.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
ayas.translation: That day people will proceed separately to be shown their deeds.
ayas.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

ayas.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
ayas.translation: Whosoever has done even an atom's weight of good will behold it;
ayas.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

ayas.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
ayas.translation: And whosoever has done even an atom's weight of evil will behold that.
ayas.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
